item.title: Monster Hunter Stories 3: Twisted Reflection announced for PS5, Xbox Series, Switch 2, and PC
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Switch 2
  • Xbox Series

A new tale of Riders and monsters takes flight.

Capcom has announced Monster Hunter Stories 3: Twisted Reflection for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch 2, and PC (Steam). It will launch in 2026.

Here is an overview of the game, via Capcom:

A new tale of Riders and monsters takes flight! Monster Hunter Stories 3: Twisted Reflection is the next evolution of the turn-based, story-rich RPG series.

Twin Rathalos, born in a twist of fate, ignite the long dormant flames of war between two fractured nations: Azuria and Vermeil. You are the heir to the kingdom of Azuria, and the sole Rathalos Rider in the kingdom. On the brink of war and amidst strange phenomena threatening the world, a life changing event propels you beyond the Meridian, and on an unforgettable journey in search of the truth.

item.title: EXILEDGE – ChinaJoy 2025 trailer
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5

Latest look at the PlayStation China Hero Project shooter.

Enigmatrix has released a new gameplay trailer for PlayStation China Hero Project-supported third-person shooter EXILEDGE as part of today’s China Hero Project Phase 4 Press Conference ahead of ChinaJoy 2025 this weekend.

Here is a brief overview of the game, via Enigmatrix:

The universe trembles, the soil shatters.

A young man called Alter embarks on the adventure to uncover the destiny of the world built by Zora. In EXILEDGE, experience a unique combat system on the base of third-person shooter with hack and slash. Fight along with the mysterious girl, Zora, and experience colorful battles and epic boss fights. Search for the truth of the universe and the opportunity to save the world in an eternal cycle.

EXILEDGE will be available for PlayStation 5 and PC.

item.title: Daba: Land of Water Scar – ChinaJoy 2025 ‘Behind-the-Scenes’ trailer
item.content:encoded:
• PS5

A look at the action RPG's development.

Dark Star has released a new gameplay trailer for PlayStation China Hero Project-supported action RPG Daba: Land of Water Scar as part of today’s China Hero Project Phase 4 Press Conference ahead of ChinaJoy 2025 this weekend.

Here is a brief overview of the game:

Daba: Land of Water Scar is a new title from Dark Star. It tells the story of a humanoid clay puppet. When the world is on the verge of collapse, the puppet traces the whereabouts of the water fragments within the ancient city, and throughout their journey of defeating enemies and seeking answers, unravels the story of the world and oneself. The game features various landscapes including abandoned ruins, a magnificent ancient city, gloomy prison, vast rift valley, expansive snowfield, deadly forest, and a floating city. Non-linear levels are interconnected, distinct, and intricate.

Daba: Land of Water Scar will be available for PlayStation 5.

item.title: Visual novel / action adventure game Yggdra Kingdom announced for PS4, Switch
item.content:encoded:
• PS4
  • Switch

Due out on November 27 in Japan.

New studio Parallel Creates has announced Yggdra Kingdom, a new visual novel / action adventure game for PlayStation 4 and Switch. It will launch on November 27 in Japan for 9,878 yen.

A limited edition will also be available for 14,278 yen, which includes a B2-size tapestry and an art book.

Here is the story synopsis:

During a field trip to London, protagonist Eiha Nagai gets lost in the city at night. After somehow making it to the station, he discovers a mysterious egg in the pitch-black terminal.

“What kind of egg is this? It’s so beautiful…”

Just then, the egg cracked and shattered before his eyes, and he lost consciousness.

When he awoke, he was standing in a entirely different world—one that still resembled London, yet was completely distinct.

The Royal Capital: Salem.

There, he meets a girl named Shelley Reinstad, who is searching for her father, accused by the kingdom of regicide.

To return to his own world—and to help the girl who saved him…

As Eiha continues to fight, donning the dragon armor Clarias, he draws ever closer to the truth hidden within this world.
